title: LFM Ranked solo Q climb
body:
Hello Everyone, Myself and a friend are looking to get out of the silver and gold.. I Adc main and he is a support/mid main.

I am currently in Silver 3 and he is currently Gold 2, Looking for either people that know what their doing and have a good understand of the game.
We use TeamSpeak so if you have that would be a bonus.

If people want to smurf and play with us, I also have two unranked level 30 accounts that you can play on

replies.body: Add me and play a norm with me. If you like what you see then lets make magic happen.
I'm down - S4 atm on a steady climb
i am bronze and im looking for people to play with so i can climb
